pages.text: Elemental soil is all that is required in order to grown either of the four elemental plants: $(l:herbs/infernal_bulb)infernal bulb$(), $(l:herbs/dewgonia)dewgonia$(), $(l:herbs/stalicripe)stalicripe$() and $(l:herbs/cloud_berry)cloud berry$().$(br2)$(info) This soil can also grow almost any other crop, giving them all a growth boost.$(br2)There are also variants of elemental soil aligned with each of the four elements, with special crafting methods.
Caelic soil is produced when elemental soil is thrown onto the ground
